JavaLog.debugger
Interface EventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DebugThreadsState, DebugThreadState, Debugger, RootHotpoint, HotpointsManager, DebugView, DebuggerGUI, DebugRunner
public interface EventListener

EventListener. Interface que deben implementar las clases que deseen escuchar los eventos provenientes del dispatcher.
